columns.Gymnast_ID: A unique identifier for each gymnast, linking their performance records to their respective profiles.
columns.Floor_Exercise_Points: The score awarded to the gymnast for their performance on the floor exercise apparatus.
columns.Pommel_Horse_Points: The score awarded to the gymnast for their performance on the pommel horse apparatus.
columns.Rings_Points: The score awarded to the gymnast for their performance on the rings apparatus.
columns.Vault_Points: The score awarded to the gymnast for their performance on the vault apparatus.
columns.Parallel_Bars_Points: The score awarded to the gymnast for their performance on the parallel bars apparatus.
columns.Horizontal_Bar_Points: The score awarded to the gymnast for their performance on the horizontal bar apparatus.
columns.Total_Points: The cumulative score of all individual apparatus performances for the gymnast.

gymnast.table_description: The gymnast table records individual performance scores across various gymnastic apparatus for each gymnast, providing a comprehensive view of their scoring in competitions.

columns.People_ID: A unique identifier assigned to each individual in the table.
columns.Name: The full name of the individual.
columns.Age: The age of the individual in years.
columns.Height: The height of the individual measured in meters.
columns.Hometown: The city or town where the individual is from.

people.table_description: The 'people' table contains information about individuals, including their unique ID, name, age, height, and hometown, serving as a reference for related data in the gymnast database.
